summary: A script that conducts a load‑test of the Litellm Router by issuing asynchronous completion requests while using an S3‑backed cache. It configures environment variables, initializes the router with caching, runs a high volume of calls, records timing and errors, and prints performance metrics.
business_intent: To benchmark and validate the scalability and caching effectiveness of the Litellm routing layer when integrated with Amazon S3 storage, ensuring reliable response times under load.
